maint.commit_message: Update README
Add the renamed .F90 files, enable CPP capability.
More fixes with 64-bit indexing.

Add METIS ordering option.
Add EXAMPLE/dreadtriple_noheader.c

Fix memory expansion related routines for 64bit integers.
Add superlu_config.h, for CI testing to work.
First version of 64bit integer support. Has some bugs.
update URL in superlu.pc.in
No need for input_error.c in CBLAS/, cblas is allways used together with SRC/ directory.
Add #include <unistd.h> in EXAMPLE/ files, to get prototype for getopt().
Add several prototypes in EXAMPLE/ files.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/xiaoyeli/superlu

copied input_error.c in CBLAS/ dir.
a few other small updates.
update CMakeeLists.txt for proper passing in TPL_BLAS_LIBRARIES

Merge pull request #63 from gruenich/master

Fix CMake 3.20 and Clang 15 warnings

Don't use K&R-style function definitions

Fixes a warning (-Wdeprecated-non-prototype) that a function
definition without a prototype is deprecated in all versions
 of C and is not supported in C2x

Add arguments to function prototypes

Fixes compiler warning (-Wstrict-prototypes) that a function
declaration without a prototype is deprecated in all versions of C

Remove strange declaration of fopen()

Fixes a warning (-Wstrict-prototypes) that function declaration
without a prototype is deprecated in all versions of C

[cmake] Don't include headers in library.

- Headers don't belong in libraries
- The variable was misspelled (all caps) and did not add anything

[cmake] Add missing file extensions in CBLAS

Otherwise CMake 3.20 and newer complain with CMP0115.

Merge pull request #59 from Smit-create/warn_1

Fix warnings

Merge pull request #60 from Biswa96/cmake-install-dll

CMake: Fix installing DLL in binary directory

CMake: Fix installing DLL in binary directory

DLL is not installed without this addition
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/xiaoyeli/superlu into warn_1
Fix build warning ([-Wpointer-to-int-cast])
Removing trailing white spaces
Remove a lot of warnings per Isssue #53, unused variables.
Incorporate PR #56 changes in basefiles, produce the codes for the other 3 precision.

Merge pull request #56 from liviofetahu/fix-spsolve-alloc

BUG: fix memory error caused from overflowing signed 32-bit int input to doubleCalloc

work = doubleCalloc(n*nrhs) now executes for right-hand sides B of size 46679 by 46680 filled with doubles, and some (size_t) casts that fix proper indexing into buffers such as work_col = &work[(size_t)j * (size_t)n].

Fixed the signature of doubleMalloc and doubleCalloc in the implementation file: SUPERLU_MALLOC now passes the correct value to void *superlu_python_module_malloc(size_t size) which internally calls malloc(size).
Fixed the signature of doubleMalloc and particularly doubleCalloc: possibly malloc needs to allocate >= 2^31 bytes.
Update test.yml
Update README
Add the renamed .F90 files, enable CPP capability.
More fixes with 64-bit indexing.

Add METIS ordering option.
Add EXAMPLE/dreadtriple_noheader.c

Fix memory expansion related routines for 64bit integers.
Add superlu_config.h, for CI testing to work.
First version of 64bit integer support. Has some bugs.
update URL in superlu.pc.in
No need for input_error.c in CBLAS/, cblas is allways used together with SRC/ directory.
Add #include <unistd.h> in EXAMPLE/ files, to get prototype for getopt().
Add several prototypes in EXAMPLE/ files.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/xiaoyeli/superlu

copied input_error.c in CBLAS/ dir.
a few other small updates.
update CMakeeLists.txt for proper passing in TPL_BLAS_LIBRARIES

Merge pull request #56 from liviofetahu/fix-spsolve-alloc

BUG: fix memory error caused from overflowing signed 32-bit int input to doubleCalloc

work = doubleCalloc(n*nrhs) now executes for right-hand sides B of size 46679 by 46680 filled with doubles, and some (size_t) casts that fix proper indexing into buffers such as work_col = &work[(size_t)j * (size_t)n].

Fixed the signature of doubleMalloc and particularly doubleCalloc: possibly malloc needs to allocate >= 2^31 bytes.
Update test.yml

master.commit_message:
Merge pull request #121 from gruenich/fix/missing-paratheses-cmake

[cmake] Add missing parantheses
[cmake] Add missing paratheses
Change default to not find doxygen
Correct the error in rank deficient case.

Merge pull request #117 from dsaocean/RankDeficientRect

Rank Deficient Matrices

Merge pull request #116 from lysnikolaou/complex-to-singlecomplex

Rename complex occurences to singlecomplex
Updated mex interface to allow rank deficient rectangular matrices
Updated mex interface to factor rectangular matrices

Updated mex interface to work in latest matlab version

Updated mex to work with rank deficient rectangular matrices
sparsfun is not supported in Matlab R2022a.  Use of this function suggests replacing with spparms.

Fixed row permutations for rank deficient rectangular matrices

Bug fix applies to some rank deficient rectangular matrices where m > n, where m is the number of rows and n is the number of columns.

Rename complex occurences to singlecomplex

- This is to avoid conflicts in packages that use both the `complex.h`
  header and SuperLU.

Closes #115.

Merge pull request #111 from wo80/fix/uninitialized-pointer

Fix uninitialized pointer warning in examples and tests

Merge pull request #107 from wo80/fix/cmake-build-msvc

CMake build with Visual Studio on Windows
Rename GetOpt to WinGetOpt
Fix MSVC warning about uninitialized pointer
Merge upstream changes.

Rename GetOpt to WinGetOpt;
Remove non-WIN32 path
Prepare release 6.0.1, updadte version string.

Merge pull request #103 from gruenich/feature/testing-use-headers

Cleanup TESTING to use more headers

Merge pull request #109 from gruenich/feature/stop-use-unistd.h

Remove unused header unistd.h from tests and examples
Remove unused header unistd.h from tests and examples
[example] Fix MSVC warning about uninitialized pointer (2)
[tests] Fix MSVC warning about uninitialized pointer
Exclude unistd.h when building with MSVC (2)
[example] Fix MSVC warning about uninitialized pointer
[cmake] Try to find getopt when building with MSVC (3)

[cmake] Try to mitigate problems with complex typedef and MSVC

When the math.h header gets included, MSVC will by default define a complex type. This can be suppressed by adding a compile definition _COMPLEX_DEFINED.
[cmake] Try to find getopt when building with MSVC (2)
Exclude unistd.h when building with MSVC
[cmake] Try to find getopt when building with MSVC
Update gitignore (exclude MSVC directories)
[testing] Replace pow_dd by math.h's pow

[testing] Remove duplicate slu_Cnames.h

Use same file from SRC/
[testing] Replace d_lg10, r_lg10 by log10, log10f from math.h

[testing] Include math.h instead of forward declaring math functions

Exmaples are log, sin, sqrt.
[testing] Intorduce header matgen.h instead of forward declarations

Merge pull request #102 from gruenich/fix/cmake-doxygen-call

[cmake] Fix Doxygen call

[cmake] Prevent creation of target doc if Doxygen was not found

Calling doxygen_add_docs without Doxygen leads to an fatal error.

[cmake] Fix Doxygen call

ALL in doxygen_add_docs requries CMake 3.12 or newer.
ALL in doxygen_add_docs comes after files or dirs

Merge pull request #100 from gruenich/fix/align-declarations-malloc

Adjust forward delcaration of float/double Malloc/Calloc

Merge pull request #99 from gruenich/feature/improve-fortran

Improve Fortran with CMake

Merge pull request #97 from gruenich/feature/cleanup-examples

Improve code in example/

Adjust forward delcaration of float/double Malloc/Calloc

The argument was changed in slu_sdefs.h / slu_ddefs.h and
remained in slu_cdefs.h / slu_zdefs.h. This leads to
incompatible declarations.
[cmake] Minor cleanup in main CMakeLists.txt

[cmake] Offer option enable_examples

Use can define to build examples with ALL
[fortran] Update FORTRAN/README to cover CMake

[fortran] Remove example output

It does not serve any purpose
[cmake] Use target example also for Fortran examples

[cmake] Fix building Fortran examples

Both main Fortran files where part of the library.
Remove use of enable_* variables

[cmake] Add option enable_fortran

Handle XSDK_ENABLE_Fortran similar to XSDK_ENABLE_Fortran.

[cmake] Improve handling of option to use internal CBLAS

Honor enable_internal_blaslib if set by the user, do not
always override with xSDK's default value.
[cmake] Concentrate handling of options and xSDK varialbes at one place

[fortran] Remote CMake code to build fortran examples

The Fortran code is not provided for f_p?drive,
fpd?drive3d, f_5x5
[cmake] Remove trailing whitespace and tabs
[example] Remove unused variable

[example] Suppress warning for unused variable sol

It is there for educational purposes
[example] Add missing include getopt.h
[example] localize scope for loop counter variables

[exmaple] Add return statement for all main functions

Use defined constants to indicate success and failure.
[example] Define some varialbes in more local scope for ?itersol?.c
[example] Remove unused variables in ?itersol?.c
[example] Remove unused file fgmr.c
[example] Reduce scope of multiple variables in *fgmr.c

Merge pull request #98 from gruenich/feature/cmake-build-examples

Build examples with CMake

Merge pull request #96 from gruenich/feature/testing-remove-f2c.h

Remove f2c.h from TESTING

[cmake] Add targets to build examples

Independent of whether enable_examples is set, the target
builds all examples or subsets by data type.

[cmake] Improve mechanism to build example with target all

No longer exclude the folder EXAMPLE/. Instead, build
executeable only for target all if enable_examples is set.
[cmake] Build examples with CMake
[matgen] Remove remaing parts of f2c.h
[matgen] Use abs from stdlib.h or fabs instead of f2c.h macro

[matgen] Use SUPERLU_MIN and SUPERLU_MAX

Drop re-defintion of min and max from f2c.h
Don't include f2c.h, if possible.

[matgen] Use typdef doublecomplex from slu_dcomplex.h

Remove additional definition from f2c.h.
Do not include f2c.h where possible.

[matgen] Use typdef complex from slu_scomplex.h

Remove additional definition from f2c.h.
Do not include f2c.h where possible.
[matgen] Use C variable type float over macro real
[matgen] Use C variable type double over macro doublereal
add back abs() function in MATGEN/f2c.h, which is needed in complex testers.

Merge pull request #94 from gruenich/feature/alter-enable_doc

[cmake] Alter way of handling enable_doc

Merge pull request #93 from gruenich/feature/testing-reduce-f2c

testing/matgen: reduce use of f2c.h

[cmake] Alter way of handling enable_doc

From now on, "make doc" (or ninja doc or whatever) does always build
the Doxygen documentation, given Doxygen is found.
When passing "enable_doc=1" to cmake, "make doc" is added to the
default target, i.e., when running "make" (or "make all" or
"ninja") Doxygen documentation is automatically created.

[cmake] Set C standard to C99 without GNU extensions for whole project

Does not overwrite setting by user, if variables are set.
[matgen] Use C variable type int over macro integer
[matgen] Remove unused typedefs from f2c.h

[matgen] Replace macros dmin and dmax

dmin is never used
dmax is replaced by fmax from math.h
[matgen] Use abs from stdlib.h instead of a macro
[matgen] Use fabs from stdlib.h instead of macro dabs
[matgen] Drop codepath for KR-style functions
[matgen] Use void instead of f2c macro

[matgen] Use C99's bool

Replace f2c' use of int with TRUE_ and FALSE_

Merge pull request #95 from gruenich/feature/doxygen-example-module

Doxygen module for examples
[doxygen] Improve function documentation for c files
[doxygen] Improve function documentation for d files
[doxygen] Improve function documentation for s files
[doxygen] Improve function documentation for z files

[doxygen] Add module Example

Fix use of \file tags for examples

Merge pull request #92 from gruenich/feature/doxygen-include-modules-for-make

[doxygen] Include modules.txt and mainpage.txt in DoxyConfig

[doxygen] Include modules.txt and mainpage.txt in DoxyConfig

This added the missing files when building the Doxygen documentation
with Make. When using CMake, the DoxyConfig is generated on the
fly and it already contains these two files.
Update modules.txt

Merge pull request #89 from gruenich/feature/doxygen-testing

Improve Doxygen for TESTING/

[cleanup] Remove .bak file, probably accidentially comitted

Usually, .bak files indicate backup files generated by editors.

[doxygen] Improve documentation for remaining testing files

Fix use of \file to not include just the license text.
Add \param and remove non-doxygen formattings.
Use Doxygen module

[doxygen] Improve documentation for testing of complex double

Fix use of \file to not include just the license text.
Add \param and remove non-doxygen formattings.
Use Doxygen module

[doxygen] Improve documentation for testing of float

Fix use of \file to not include just the license text.
Add \param and remove non-doxygen formattings.
Use Doxygen module

[doxygen] Improve documentation for testing of double

Fix use of \file to not include just the license text.
Add \param and remove non-doxygen formattings.
Use Doxygen module

[doxygen] Improve documentation for testing of complex float

Fix use of \file to not include just the license text.
Add \param and remove non-doxygen formattings.
Use Doxygen module

[doc] Add Doxygen modules

This helps to structure the documentation.

[doc] Move Doxygen main page to DOC/

Additional Doxygen files will be placed next to
the main page in the same folder.
[cmake] Fix sub-directory to scan for Doxygen comments
In ILU routines, fix memory leak.
Gaurd printf in get_perm_c.c

Merge pull request #86 from gruenich/feature/doxygen

CMake: Enable Doxygen

[cmake] Improve hanldling of Doxygen

Add sub-folders EXAMPLE and FORTRAN.
Write all warnings into "doxygen.log" to not clutter the output.
Further reduced Doxygen warnings

Fix comment to redunce Doxygen warnings

Extracted from #25 / commit 475956d.

Fix comment to redunce Doxygen warnings

Extracted from #25 / commit 3f2dbef.

[cmake] Initial support for Doxygen

Bump required CMake version to 3.9 to get Doxygen
support out of the box

Merge pull request #84 from gruenich/feature/fix-clang-warnings

Fix many clang warnings

Add error handling for invalid input in dmach, smach

Prevents users from passing invalid arguments.
Get rid of rmach is unitiliazed warning.

Add error handling when A is unsported for ?gssv

Prevents users from passing invalid arguments, as A
must be SLU_NC or SLU_NR.
Get rid of AA is unitiliazed warning.
Adjust formittag to separat different cases better in ?larnd

Add error handling input is not valid for ?larnd

Prevents users from passing invalid arguments.
Ensures that the return value is initialized.
Remove pointless return statement in clarnd, zlarnd

Change return type of input_error to void

There is no use of always return 0.
Remove unused labels L90 from clacon2, zlacon2

Remove unused variables

Or hide them behind debug macros

Merge pull request #83 from gruenich/feature/fix-readrhs

Reduce warnings and fix bugs in ?readrhs
White space and old code cleanup in ?readrhs

Fix broken ?readrhs in sreadMM.c, sreadMM.c

GCC's static analyzer detected multiple fclose.

Remove declaraton of fopen() without arguments

Clang in C11 mode warns about these.

Merge pull request #82 from gruenich/feature/c99-compatibility-fweimer-rh

C99 compatibility fixes

[testing] Include getopt.h

Having getopt() in unistd.h is a GNU extension, with -std=c99
or c11 the user is warned about its implicit declaration.
[example] main() should actually return an int

Explicitly declare main as returning int.

This avoids build failures with future compilers which do not
support implicit ints.

Include "slu_sdefs.h" instead of "slu_Cnames.h"

As a result, the function input_error is declared.  This avoids
a build failure with future compilers which do not support implicit
function declarations.

Add more prototypes for BLAS functions

This avoids build failures with future compilers which do not support
implicit function declarations.
Small fixes for release.

Merge pull request #81 from gruenich/feature/improve-cmake

Minor improvements to base CMakeLists.txt
[cmake] Improve comments and whitespace

[cmake] Remove not required install variables

CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH is set later a second time.
CMAKE_INSTALL_NAME_DIR gets a sane default value by CMake.
CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX gets defaulted to /usr/local on Unix.

[cmake] Explicitly include GNUInstallDirs

For example, CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR is used in this file, defined
in GNUInstallDirs.

[cmake] Write CMake commands lower case

Don't mix different styles in same file

README: Fix wrong CMake example call

Path to source directory must be the last argument.
The command should not end with a \ which indicates a line break
add FORTRAN/CMakeLists.txt
Fix 64bit indexing for solve and routines in expert driver.
Update README
Add the renamed .F90 files, enable CPP capability.
More fixes with 64-bit indexing.

Add METIS ordering option.
Add EXAMPLE/dreadtriple_noheader.c

Fix memory expansion related routines for 64bit integers.
Add superlu_config.h, for CI testing to work.
First version of 64bit integer support. Has some bugs.
update URL in superlu.pc.in
No need for input_error.c in CBLAS/, cblas is allways used together with SRC/ directory.
Add #include <unistd.h> in EXAMPLE/ files, to get prototype for getopt().
Add several prototypes in EXAMPLE/ files.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/xiaoyeli/superlu

copied input_error.c in CBLAS/ dir.
a few other small updates.
update CMakeeLists.txt for proper passing in TPL_BLAS_LIBRARIES

Merge pull request #94 from gruenich/feature/alter-enable_doc

Merge pull request #93 from gruenich/feature/testing-reduce-f2c

testing/matgen: reduce use of f2c.h

[cmake] Alter way of handling enable_doc

From now on, "make doc" (or ninja doc or whatever) does always build
the Doxygen documentation, given Doxygen is found.
When passing "enable_doc=1" to cmake, "make doc" is added to the
default target, i.e., when running "make" (or "make all" or
"ninja") Doxygen documentation is automatically created.

[cmake] Set C standard to C99 without GNU extensions for whole project

Does not overwrite setting by user, if variables are set.
[matgen] Use C variable type int over macro integer
[matgen] Remove unused typedefs from f2c.h

[matgen] Replace macros dmin and dmax

dmin is never used
dmax is replaced by fmax from math.h
[matgen] Use abs from stdlib.h instead of a macro
[matgen] Use fabs from stdlib.h instead of macro dabs
[matgen] Drop codepath for KR-style functions
[matgen] Use void instead of f2c macro

[matgen] Use C99's bool

Replace f2c' use of int with TRUE_ and FALSE_

Fix many clang warnings

Prevents users from passing invalid arguments.

Prevents users from passing invalid arguments, as A
must be SLU_NC or SLU_NR.
Get rid of AA is unitiliazed warning.

Prevents users from passing invalid arguments.
Ensures that the return value is initialized.
Remove pointless return statement in clarnd, zlarnd

Merge pull request #83 from gruenich/feature/fix-readrhs

Reduce warnings and fix bugs in ?readrhs
White space and old code cleanup in ?readrhs

Fix broken ?readrhs in sreadMM.c, sreadMM.c

GCC's static analyzer detected multiple fclose.

Remove declaraton of fopen() without arguments

Clang in C11 mode warns about these.

Merge pull request #82 from gruenich/feature/c99-compatibility-fweimer-rh

C99 compatibility fixes

[testing] Include getopt.h

Having getopt() in unistd.h is a GNU extension, with -std=c99
or c11 the user is warned about its implicit declaration.
[example] main() should actually return an int

Explicitly declare main as returning int.

This avoids build failures with future compilers which do not
support implicit ints.

Include "slu_sdefs.h" instead of "slu_Cnames.h"

As a result, the function input_error is declared.  This avoids
a build failure with future compilers which do not support implicit
function declarations.

Add more prototypes for BLAS functions

This avoids build failures with future compilers which do not support
implicit function declarations.
Small fixes for release.

Merge pull request #81 from gruenich/feature/improve-cmake

Minor improvements to base CMakeLists.txt
[cmake] Improve comments and whitespace

[cmake] Remove not required install variables

CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH is set later a second time.
CMAKE_INSTALL_NAME_DIR gets a sane default value by CMake.
CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX gets defaulted to /usr/local on Unix.

[cmake] Explicitly include GNUInstallDirs

For example, CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR is used in this file, defined
in GNUInstallDirs.

[cmake] Write CMake commands lower case

Don't mix different styles in same file

README: Fix wrong CMake example call

Path to source directory must be the last argument.
The command should not end with a \ which indicates a line break
add FORTRAN/CMakeLists.txt
Fix 64bit indexing for solve and routines in expert driver.
Update README
Add the renamed .F90 files, enable CPP capability.
More fixes with 64-bit indexing.

Add METIS ordering option.
Add EXAMPLE/dreadtriple_noheader.c

Fix memory expansion related routines for 64bit integers.
Add superlu_config.h, for CI testing to work.
First version of 64bit integer support. Has some bugs.
update URL in superlu.pc.in
No need for input_error.c in CBLAS/, cblas is allways used together with SRC/ directory.
Add #include <unistd.h> in EXAMPLE/ files, to get prototype for getopt().
Add several prototypes in EXAMPLE/ files.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/xiaoyeli/superlu

copied input_error.c in CBLAS/ dir.
a few other small updates.
update CMakeeLists.txt for proper passing in TPL_BLAS_LIBRARIES

definition without a prototype is deprecated in all versions
 of C and is not supported in C2x

declaration without a prototype is deprecated in all versions of C

without a prototype is deprecated in all versions of C

Merge pull request #56 from liviofetahu/fix-spsolve-alloc

BUG: fix memory error caused from overflowing signed 32-bit int input to doubleCalloc

work = doubleCalloc(n*nrhs) now executes for right-hand sides B of size 46679 by 46680 filled with doubles, and some (size_t) casts that fix proper indexing into buffers such as work_col = &work[(size_t)j * (size_t)n].

Fixed the signature of doubleMalloc and doubleCalloc in the implementation file: SUPERLU_MALLOC now passes the correct value to void *superlu_python_module_malloc(size_t size) which internally calls malloc(size).
Fixed the signature of doubleMalloc and particularly doubleCalloc: possibly malloc needs to allocate >= 2^31 bytes.
Update test.yml
